thread.title: The Internet Mocks Odell Beckham Jr. And The Giants After Terrible Playoff Game Against Packers
thread.title_full: The Internet Mocks Odell Beckham Jr. And The Giants After Terrible Playoff Game Against Packers

author: Jorge Alonso
title: The Internet Mocks Odell Beckham Jr. And The Giants After Terrible Playoff Game Against Packers
text:
Last week, Odell Beckham Jr. and several NY Giants wide receivers went and partied on a boat in Miami with rapper Trey Songz. Odell and the boys had a terrible game this week against the Packers in the NFC wildcard playoffs and Twitter roasted them. 
Lord help us pic.twitter.com/aPZh3TWY6T 
— Ashley Nicole (@geeksandcleats) January 9, 2017 
Time for Odell to pull out the Stickum. pic.twitter.com/3GEiRxDrNE 
— Matt Halfhill (@MattHalfhill) January 9, 2017 


Odell Beckham Jr. leaving his hands in Miami. #NYGvsGB pic.twitter.com/F6nH0P8pY3 
— Dylan (@DylansFreshTake) January 9, 2017 
Odell Beckham Jr be like… pic.twitter.com/H5c8OcJynB 
— Fake SportsCenter (@FakeSportsCentr) January 8, 2017 


@DylansFreshTake pic.twitter.com/kAKaepQJ9n 
— ChampagneMami (13-3) (@seauxdevine) January 9, 2017 
pic.twitter.com/197xg3tA3z 
— Father O'Blivion (@ewangs) January 9, 2017 


Odell's stats for today's game. pic.twitter.com/HQpRyMEi9P 
— BLACK ADAM SCHEFTER (@B1ackSchefter) January 9, 2017 
The only thing Odell Beckham Jr was able to catch tonight pic.twitter.com/HyfkPveZBt 
— 1994 Subaru Outback (@Sadieisonfire) January 9, 2017 


Reporters heading to Odell's locker right now… pic.twitter.com/MCx2YWcYfz 
— trey wingo (@wingoz) January 9, 2017 
YOU HAD ONE JOB ODELL pic.twitter.com/txtMjOO8zZ 
— SB Nation GIF (@SBNationGIF) January 9, 2017 


Eli throws it 4 feet over Odell's head. "SHOULD'VE STAYED OFF THE BOAT "
— Mina Kimes (@minakimes) January 9, 2017
